thread.title: Carson campaign raises $20 million in three months
thread.title_full: Carson campaign raises $20 million in three months - POLITICO

author: Michael Hirsh
title: Carson campaign raises $20 million in three months
text:
Ben Carson's presidential campaign has raised $20 million in the last three months, according to a new report published Wednesday. The fundraising haul, which will be made publicly available on Oct. 15, is a staggering sum that would put Carson, the conservative former pediatric neurosurgeon, in the top tier of well-funded campaigns, with more than $30 million raised in total.
The news was first reported by the Associated Press. Multiple Carson campaign staffers didn't immediately respond to requests for confirmation, but last week, communications director Doug Watts told POLITICO that the campaign was on track to raise $20 million for this fundraising quarter, which ended on Wednesday.
